cast.overview: After his life is turned upside down when his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack, a brilliant but introverted CIA decoder takes matters into his own hands when his supervisors refuse to take action.
cast.title: The Amateur

details.biography: Nick Mills is a Tony Award winning lead producer of Stereophonic on Broadway, the West End, and the U.S. National Tour. He is the co-founder of A Great Love Productions with his wife, Ashley Melone. Notable acting credits include 'The Amateur' (20th Century), Succession (HBO), and Mr. Robot (USA) among others. He teaches at NYU Tisch and lives in Manhattan with his wife & three children.
details.name: Nick Mills
